thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: You know what you get
thread.title_full: You know what you get - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BGomD
title: You know what you get
text:
I have a saying every time I go on holiday and I have problems to find a good and reliable hotel, if the city has a Hilton, go there, you always know what you get. No surprises!
The hotel was in very good condition, clean and it was very quiet. The location was amazing, just 2 min away from the Empire State which makes a difference as most of the attractions are around midtown.
We walked to other sections of the city from there very easily too.
There is a restaurant/pub next to it where they serve reasonable good food.
The hotel also booked for us a taxi to go to the airport at a flat rate so that was quite convenient and they sent for me a postcard that I wanted to send to my family.
Great staff, service and great location!
